column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
hello welcome you're now talking to AI doctor OK hello doctor
Hi there! What can I help you with today?

I recommend that you abstain from drinking alcohol, as it can have many harmful effects on your body. Additionally, too much alcohol can make it difficult to focus on self-care and managing your health.
